alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lowndes County through 515 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near I-75 At Exit 16, or near Lake Park. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, I-75 At Exit 5, Twin Lakes, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 22, I-75 At Exit 11, Valdosta Regional Airport and Kinderlou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
